item.title: Trump Asks Whatley to Again Lead RNC
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump said in a Truth Social post on Wednesday that he had asked Michael Whatley to return to lead the Republican National Comm...

item.title: Sen. Duckworth to Trump: Expand IVF for Military
item.description: Sen. Tammy Duckworth, D-Ill., wants President-elect Donald Trump to support legislation that would expand IVF access for military families.

item.title: Trump Picks Navarro for Trade, Manufacturing Role
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump said on Wednesday he had picked Peter Navarro to be senior counselor for trade and manufacturing.

item.title: Trump Nominates Driscoll for Secretary of Army
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump announced he will nominate North Carolina businessman Daniel Driscoll to serve as secretary of the Army.

item.title: Trump Picks Boehler as Special Envoy for Hostage Affairs
item.description: U.S. President-elect Donald Trump said in a Truth Social post on Wednesday that Adam Boehler would be his special presidential envoy for hostage affai...
